DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this research study is to find how breast cancer responds to the investigational drug, Ispinesib. An investigational drug is a drug that has not been approved by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and is available for research use only. In particular, this study will try is to find the answers to the following research questions: 1. Does breast cancer respond to Ispinesib? 2. What are the side effects of Ispinesib? 3. How much Ispinesib is in the blood at specific times after it is taken?
DOC.brief_title: Study Of Ispinesib In Subjects With Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Stage IIIB or Stage IV breast cancer Previously received anthracycline and taxane therapy Exclusion criteria: Actively receiving anticancer therapy agent(s).
